com.stormpath.sdk.client

Class ClientApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stormpath.sdk.client.ClientApplication
  • Deprecated. 
    in 0.8 and will be removed before 1.0 final. Use the Client.Builder and then call client.getResource(appUrl, Application.class);

    @Deprecated
public class ClientApplication
extends Object

    Deprecated

    This class has been deprecated as of 0.8 and it will be removed before 1.0 final. Instead of using this class, use the Clients.builder() method and after built, call 
         client.getResource(appUrl, Application.class);
    to acquire an application instance resource.

    A ClientApplication is a simple wrapper around a Client and Application instance, returned from the ClientApplicationBuilder.ClientApplicationBuilder.build() method.

    Since:
    0.5
